synopsis.text: If you're tired of the typical goody-two-shoes heroines, then you'll love Alicia, a girl who despises them as much as you do! In her favorite otome game, she admires the villainess and wishes to be just like her. When she wakes up reincarnated as the very villainess she idolizes, Alicia sets out to become the most evil villainess the world has ever known. But no matter how hard she tries to be wicked, her fellow human beings can't help but be drawn to her, even the prince! Will Alicia succeed in her quest to become the greatest villainess of all time, or will she find herself falling for the prince who admires her so much? Follow Alicia's journey in this thrilling and unpredictable tale of love and villainy in another world!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
